DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare evolution pain profile among patient suffer lateral epicondyalgia ( tennis elbow ) follow three type treatment : PRP-L injection versus type A botulinum toxin injection versus corticoid injection .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Three Types Injection Treatment Lateral Epicondylalgia

C- The evolution maximum pain score use nocturnal post-effort ( Jamar grip test ) visual analog scale ( VAS ) day 0 , 3 week , 6 week , 3 month 6 month . D- The perception change Patient 's Global Impression Change score ( PGIC ) 3 6 month E- The evolution PRTEE score 0 , 3 6 month F- Adverse event 3 week , 6 week , 3 month 6 month . G - Quality life utility via SF-12 3 6 month . H- The consumption analgesic .
